name: Bump In The Night (Stepford, SlickRamen)
description:
Have you ever had those thoughts? 

You walk through your dark hallway late at night.

You see the light shining out from the bottom of your doorway in the distance.

You start to speed up - feeling a presence behind you.

Faster. You run as fast as you can, bursting into your room.

You close the door behind you, feeling a blast of cold air behind you.

You never realized how fortunate you truly were, did you?


--------------------------------------------------------------

This is a game where you play as a small child who procrastinated during the day. Spent all day playing video games, and now that everyone is asleep - they have to do their chores in the dark. Move quickly through the hallways, avoid ghostly figures and get your jobs done before IT catches you...

--------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W - Move Upwards

A - Move Left

S - Move Downwards

D - Move Right

E - Interact

Mouse Click - Navigate Menus
